descriptions.body: Execution: → Stand tall with feet hip-width apart. → Take a step forward with your right leg, lowering your hips until both knees are bent at about a 90-degree angle. Ensure your right knee does not go past your right toes. → Push back up to the starting position and repeat with the left leg.
Warm-Up: Begin with a 5-10 minute warm-up of light cardio (e.g., jogging in place, jumping jacks) to get your muscles ready.
Repetitions: Continue alternating legs until you reach a total of 300 lunges. Break the lunges into sets if needed (e.g., 10 sets of 30 lunges).
